action_list.description: Executes upgrade.sh to upgrade Xtract

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

echo "Running Xtract Upgrade"
sudo /mnt/sda2/var/lib/boot2docker/bin/update-xtract install

if [ $? -eq 0 ]
then
  echo "Completed"
else
  echo "Please check the Xtract logs for further analysis"
fi

action_list.name: RunUpgrade

action_list.description: Sets the LogLevel for Xtract
action_list.name: LogEnabler
